balance.description: balance is the balance of the coin.

QuerySpendableBalanceByDenomResponse.title: Query Spendable Balance By Denom Response
QuerySpendableBalanceByDenomResponse.description: QuerySpendableBalanceByDenomResponse defines the gRPC response structure for querying an account's spendable balance for a specific denom.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.
